EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading the In-Memory Data Caching for Microservices Architectures white paper
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the In-Memory Data Caching for Microservices Architectures white paper, authored by Pivotal’s Jagdish Mirani <[[https://content.pivotal.io/authors/jagdish-mirani]]>. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you explore the benefits of a data layered microservices architecture.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources useful:
- Website: Pivotal GemFire - In-Memory Data Grid powered by Apache Geode <[[https://pivotal.io/pivotal-gemfire]]> - eBook: Scaling Data Services with Pivotal GemFire <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/scaling-data-services-with-pivotal-gemfire]]> - Analyst Report: Gartner’s Market Guide for Application Platforms <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/gartner-market-guide-for-application-platforms]]>
- Blog: An Introduction to Look-Aside vs Inline Caching <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/an-introduction-to-look-aside-vs-inline-caching-patterns]]>
- Podcast: How to Become a Maestro of Microservices with Spring Cloud Data Flow <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/how-to-become-a-maestro-of-microservices-with-spring-cloud-data-flow?utm_source=social&account_id&utm_medium=TWITTER&PivotalBigData&utm_campaign=Big%20Data&20170208]]>
- Blog: Getting Started with Domain Driven Design—Top 3 Concepts <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/getting-started-with-domain-driven-design-top-3-concepts]]>
- eBook: Cloud Foundry: The Cloud-Native Platform <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-the-cloud-native-platform]]>
- White Paper: Supercharging Your Microservices With NetflixOSS and Spring Cloud <[[https://pivotal.io/supercharging-your-microservices-with-netflixoss-and-spring-cloud]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
